item.title: How to add custom item?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

you need to declare this method:

public private static final void boolean juiceBox<String int> ;

no but srsly:

if(i == 9841){  //~white mask~
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringarray189[1] = "wear";
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
//Purple: 926-127
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = white;
class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 900;
class8.anInt190 = 400;
class8.anInt198 = 1850;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 3188;
class8.anInt200 = 255;
class8.anInt175 = 255;
class8.anInt197 = 100;
class8.aString170 = "white mask";
class8.ByteArray178 = "white mask created by hmoobvajboi".getBytes<>;
}
